PERSONA:
meet james, a 38-year-old married man living in a metropolitan area in the pacific region of the west coast. james is a college-educated professional with a postgraduate degree, and he identifies as a white non-hispanic american born and raised in the united states.

james is a devout protestant christian who attends religious services more than once a week. he considers himself a born-again or evangelical christian, and his faith plays a significant role in his life. despite his conservative religious beliefs, james leans towards the democratic party in his political views, identifying as a moderate or conservative democrat.

financially, james is in a comfortable position, with an annual family income of $100,000 or more, placing him in the upper-income tier. he is a registered voter and takes his civic duties seriously, staying informed and participating in the electoral process.

in his free time, james enjoys volunteering and giving back to his community. he is an avid internet user, accessing it several times a day for work, leisure, and staying connected with friends and family.

james leads a balanced life, balancing his professional and personal responsibilities while maintaining a strong connection to his faith, family, and community. he is a well-rounded individual with a diverse set of interests and values.
